newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Creative hits a low of S$32 after lunch.
newsitem.headline: Creative hits a low of S$32 after lunch.

text.p: Share prices of Creative Technology dropped to Singapore $32 on profit-taking shortly after its trade suspension was lifted following the lunch break on Tuesday, dealers said.
At 0625 GMT, the shares were trading around S$33.10, down 80 cents from Monday. Volume was around 162,000 shares.
Dealers said the selling followed the multimedia firm's announcement of full year earnings which were in line with market expectations.
Late Monday, Creative announced a net profit of US$167 million for year ended June 1997 against a loss of US$37.6 million previously.
